sources.title: Bored of Education (1946)
sources.description: Lulu answers wrong on a history quiz after cheating off of Tubby. While sitting in the corner and wearing a dunce cap Lulu falls asleep and dreams of chasing Tubby through history to get back at him. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/bored-of-education-1946/

metadata.Plot: Lulu answers wrong on a history quiz after cheating off of Tubby. While sitting in the corner and wearing a dunce cap Lulu falls asleep and dreams of chasing Tubby through history to get back at him.
metadata.Actors: Gwen Davies, Jack Mercer, Mae Questel
